author: nero_eth
content:
Created this PR with the following (major) changes in the EIP:
* BALs are not in the EL block body anymore and are stored separately.
* Added explicit BAL retrieval RPCs and a minimum retention rule (until last finalized checkpoint).
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10937

content: We can further dicuss it in tomorrow's breakout call.

author: tersec
content: it's not a constant, no? It's defined by https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.6.1/specs/phase0/weak-subjectivity.md#compute_weak_subjectivity_period

author: nero_eth
content: In theory yes, the wsp scales with churn and churn sublinearly with the validator set size. But the EL doesn't know about the validator set size. Since modifying the validator churn would be something we do intentional (e.g. eip-8061, thus ELs could adapt that window size) my feeling is the most easiest is to have a constant and maybe add some (small) buffer.
